oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Park Commission Members Suspended
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Park Commission; Ingram, William B.; Loeb, Henry; mayors;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On December 14, 1967, Mayor William B. Ingram, Jr. suspended three members of the Memphis Park Commission - Walker L. Wellford, Jr., John Gorman, and Lois Eason - for improper business dealings in regards to Fox Meadows Golf Course. On January 1, 1968, incoming Mayor Henry Loeb immediately reinstated the members.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Collection processed by John T. Dulaney
